pullrequest.title: Make Building Editor's palette tips tooltip clickable to open

content.raw: IIRC, users consistently clicked the icon, so I thought it would be good to support that. I think it's okay to retain the hover as well. Hopefully it doesn't mess things up.
content.html: IIRC, users consistently clicked the icon, so I thought it would be good to support that. I think it's okay to retain the hover as well. Hopefully it doesn't mess things up.
